pullrequest.title: Performance: Delete / insert models as we need them in view

content.raw:
I figure that you folks at OSRF know but, has anyone at ninesigma noticed that with a sim factor of 0.3, it is not going to be possible to complete 5 runs in 24 hours, which is what the current rules say is the time that teams have to do their runs?
The allowed sim time is 2.5 hours per run, plus setup time.  That is 17.5 hours for 5 runs and x 3 due to sim time ~= 52.5 hours.
